title: CAF opens bid for three competitions - Nigerian News , Latest Nigeria In News . Nigeria News . Your online Nigerian Newspaper .
body_text:
The Confederation of African Football has invited bids from interested countries for the 2024 CAF Women’s Champions League, Africa U-20 Cup of Nations and Africa U-17 Cup of Nations.
Africa’s soccer governing body is also looking for host for CAF Awards 2024.
Morocco hosted the last edition of the CAF Women’s Champions League, while the the previous editions of the U-20 AFCON and U-17 AFCON were staged in Egypt and Algeria respectively.
The 2023 edition of the CAF Awards was hosted by Morocco.
The 2024 CAF Super Cup between Egyptian sides, Al Ahly and Zamalek will take place in the Middle East.
The name of the host country will be announced later.
